name: Origin
description:
Origin’s software has transformed the debt capital markets, completely streamlining the way companies and investment banks work together to raise capital. Having launched just over 4 years ago, Origin is now used by over 20 investment banks and 80 borrowers in over 50 cities worldwide. Our clients include some of the largest investment banks and borrowers globally, including Barclays, Citi, and Telefonica. 

Our culture has helped us succeed where others have failed, in an industry that is famously resistant to change. We are a group of self-starters who are brave enough to take risks, and humble enough to learn from our mistakes. We know that our whole is greater than the sum of our parts, and we’re looking for like-minded individuals to join our team.

team.title: CEO, Co-Founder
team.name: Raja Palaniappan
team.bioHtml: Founder @Origin • Worked at @Lehman Brothers, @Credit Suisse • Studied at @Massachusetts Institute of Technology

team.title: CTO & Co-Founder
team.name: Robert Taylor
team.bioHtml: Co-founder @Origin. Associate @Tech Stars. Trader @JPMorgan, @Nomura. Studied @Imperial College London, @Hec Paris

team.name: Arnaud Blois
team.bioHtml: Python Engineer at Origin Markets, previously fullstack developer at Dinameal and Research Fellow at UCL, PhD in Electrical and Electronic Engineering

jobs.title: Senior Front-End Developer
jobs.description:
INTRO 
We are recruiting a front-end engineer to sculpt beautifully designed and intuitive interfaces to the highest quality on the Origin platform. 

RESPONSIBILITIES 
- Responsible for all things front-end, we currently use some remote resources but want to bring everything in-house with you assuming role of front-end architect
- Make decisions on which frameworks and packaging methodologies to use
- Oversee the process of SCSS development
- Writing unit-testable front-end code
- Designing, implementing and maintaining an engaging user experience 
- Keeping up to date with the very latest in front end technologies and practices and incorporating the best of them in the product roadmap 

REQUIRED 
- 3 years+ commercial experience
- A keen eye for design with proven experience in building modular, design centered interfaces
- A deep understanding of modular SCSS 
- Experience with tools like gulp/grunt
- Experience with tools like Browserify/Webpack/requireJS
- AngularJS experience architecting and building applications on top of APIs
- Experience with client-side testing frameworks such as PhantomJS/Jasmine

WOULD BE AWESOME 
- Experience with Python 

You MUST be eligible to work in the UK and personally have the skills described above (eg. not be a recruiter).
